Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: AI can explain many different subjects as slow or fast as you tell it to be, and it is available at any time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I would say that teacher feedback felt more insightful and helpful but the sheer amount you can get from AI outweighs the teacher feedback

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Chatgpt is very much able to learn as you use and adapt to your requirements compared to a real person
